truthfulness: I will not use AI to create content to deceive. I will not use an AI to interact with others in a way that violates reasonable expectations about the humanness, identity, or presence of their counterparty.
boundaries: I will not use AI to violate social norms such as courtesy, privacy, personal space, and benefit of the doubt.
responsibilityWithCredit: I accept responsibility for what an AI does under my direction. When I produce content with an AI's help, I will acknowledge the AI's contribution according to the reasonable expectations of my audience.
safeguards: I will take sensible measures to protect others from egregious mistakes made by AIs that I control or influence. I will allow people to escalate to me, short-circuiting layers of AI, when this is important.
